string-array.name: showcase_texts
string-array.item: Here you can see what events are going on. You can also find recent reviews of nearby restaurants and their restaurants.
Here you will write what you want to eat. The completed application will arrive at the restaurant\'s bosses near the designated location. \n\nYou are only nowhere near the Connect Foundation Pangyo!
You can find all of the quotes from your recent application here. The estimate is written by the bosses of the restaurant. You can view the quotation carefully before signing the contract.
When you sign the quotation, all your history will remain here. You can view the contract in detail.

string-array.name: example_title
string-array.item: We want to have a party near here!
Please contact the delicious chicken and beer restaurant!
We would like to have a drink of shochu on pork belly.
We are looking for a quiet place nearby.
